1: Ni Ala tɔgɔ ye, hinɛ labɔlen Tigi, hinɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen Tigi
2: Tanu bɛ Ala ye, danfɛnw Tigi,
3: hinɛ labɔlen Tigi, hinɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen Tigi.
5: An bɛ E de bato, wa an bɛ dɛmɛ ɲini E de fɛ.
6: I k'an bila sira tilennen kan,
7: I nɛɛmara maa minnu kan olu ka sira ko do, funu kɛra maa minuw kɔrɔ ani maa fililenw olu ka sira ko tɛ
